# 云计算技术与应用学习教程（C语言编程网）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yun-jisuanjishu-yu-yingyong-xuexi-jiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yun-jisuanjishu-yu-yingyong-xuexi-jiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yun-jisuanjishu-yu-yingyong-xuexi-jiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang
yun-jisuanjishu-yu-yingyong-xuexi-jiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yun-jisuanjishu-yu-yingyong-xuexi-jiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang
yun-jisuanjishu-yu-yingyong-xuexi-jiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
